Question
========

How many main effects and how many interactions are possible in a factorial 3-by-2 design?

Answerlist
----------

* One main effect and two interactions.
* Two main effects and one interaction.
* Three main effects and two interactions.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* One main effect and two interactions...: Incorrect
* Two main effects and one interaction...: Correct
* Three main effects and two interactions...: Incorrect
